text:
I'm reminded often that working as a reporter in L.A. is unique. 

Example: I'm writing about an updated smoking ban that now excludes vaping and cannabis from public places, like beaches.

But I had to note that the ban, of course, has an exemption for actors during filming.

text: A judge delays settling the dispute between the county and @LACoSheriff over a fired deputy. So his stalemate with the Board of Supervisors seems likely to continue until a June hearing. My reporting with @mayalau: https://lat.ms/2H2i6PT
author: stiles

text: I suspect this is not how R. Kelly's publicist wanted this interview to go. Wow. https://lat.ms/2NSWupX
author: stiles

text: The judge has sided — for now — with @LACoSheriff and reinstatement of a fired deputy. The court declined an emergency restraining order to stop him. The deputy will remain on the job at least until June, when the court will hold a hearing. Developing...
author: stiles

text: A sticking point now seems to be whether the fired deputy was reinstated by @LACoSheriff versus rehired. There's perhaps an issue in the law over the sheriff's authority as an independent elected official.
author: stiles

text: At a hearing in LA Superior Court over whether @LACoSheriff acted unlawfully in reinstating a deputy fired over allegations of domestic abuse. Judge seems skeptical about whether sheriff overstepped.
author: stiles

text: Speaking of the LA car #pursuit, a super famous one — Rodney King's — ended at this Lake View Terrace intersection 28 years ago. George Holliday shot the first viral video from his apartment balcony across the street. The fence in the video is still there. http://bit.ly/2UkyIWb
author: stiles

text: And just like that, it's over. Check out all the onlookers on the right taking photos with smartphones. Amazing.

text: This improvement in @realDonaldTrump's standing in South Korea is surprising. Until recently, many people there viewed him anger and befuddlement, especially re: gripes over military costs and trade deficits (or gaffes likes these I covered in 2017): https://www.latimes.com/world/asia/la-fg-southkorea-20170421-story.html …
author: stiles

text: But global concerns about North Korea’s nuclear program remained high before @realDonaldTrump's latest summit with Kim Jong Un, via @pewresearch: http://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2019/02/25/global-concerns-persist-about-north-koreas-nuclear-program-before-second-trump-kim-summit …
author: stiles

text: The North Korea summit reminds me of a @pewresearch survey on global confidence in our president. Turns out @realDonaldTrump's diplomacy has boosted South Koreans' trust in him on the world stage. (It's still half as high as @BarackObama, though). http://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2019/02/25/global-concerns-persist-about-north-koreas-nuclear-program-before-second-trump-kim-summit/ft_19-02-25_northkorea_in2018southkorean/ …
author: stiles

text: I've been out of Korea for six months, and I rarely make it through dinner at home without 고추장.
